Quickstart For CMS the quickstart package is called quickstart and this one gettingstarted, while `hst' is not part of the package name. I think all quickstart packages should have `quickstart' in their name and they also all should contain the project (product) name in their name. Or maybe there is some other consistent and clear naming scheme.
This is probably the moment where things can be tried out. Please mention that explicitely. Are there interesting points to try? Please list them here.
